transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji
Executive: Main main Dhiru baat kar raha hun Swati Sene se.
Customer: Ji ji boliye.
Executive: Aap hi dekhti hai na ye account?
Executive: Sir aapka profile abhi mere paas mein kal hi aaya hai. Mere ko account manager ek assign karna hai. Main directly nahi dekhungi. Main account manager assign karungi aapko.
Executive: Batao aapka kya concern hai aap mujhe batao.
Customer: Sir abhi kar deti hun main. Problem ye hai ki hum jo star jo humne star package liya hai. Hmm. Iske liye itna paisa nahi lagaya na ki 200, 400, 500 ka kaam hai.
Hmm hmm. Main past mein jaake dekh raha hun IndiaMART ke past wale option mein to jo bade order hai wo to mere upar aa hi nahi rahe. Notification bhi nahi aata hai wo. Na mail pe na lead mein ki kahin kisi option mein nahi aa raha hai wo. Isliye humne ye kaam nahi kiya hai na.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: To ek minute rukiyega zara. Wahi package tha.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye zara.
Customer: Jab dikhaiye ki ek bhi bada order hai kya mere upar? Ye dikhaiye aap mujhe.
Executive: Aapne usme filter kaun kaun se laga rakhe hai?
Customer: Filter kaun kaun se laga rakhe hai?
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Matlab?
Executive: Bylead mein jab aap check karte ho bade order wala to kuch filter laga kar ke dekhte hai kaise dekhte hai sir?
Customer: Nahi filter laga ke dekhte hai.
Executive: Dono tarike se dekhte hai. Usme aap ek main aapko bata deti hun. Ek to aap India ka filter lagaiye kyunki usme upar dekhiyega recommended wala laga hoga. Thik hai? Aur uske sath sath jo hai.
Customer: India ka.
Executive: Haan India ke sath sath upar na recent ka bhi filter lagaiyega. Recent ka filter. Hmm. Aur usme ek jo hai usme order value ya fir lead type do options dikhte hai. To waha pe jo hai order value mein above 1 lakh wala jo hai ya to usko laga kar ke dekh lijiye aur abhi waha pe nahi dikhta hai to fir aap usme recent pe laga kar ke dekhiye jitni bhi lead recent mein aayi hongi unko ek bar aapko jo hai matlab dekh kar ke accordingly you have to consume lead. Aur dusra jab koi lead agar chalo man lo kyunki service aapki star wali abhi shuru hui hai. Hai na? To aapko isme ek kaam karna hai ki jaise past lead mein jo bhi lead aapko achhe order ki nikal gayi thi wo lead jo hai usme feedback aapko dalna hai taki system ye guess kar paye ki aapko bade order ki hi requirement hai. Daily basis pe.
Customer: Haan. Haan daily basis pe wo feedback dalna hoga. Jaise man lo koi lead kabhi chhut jati hai kuch bhi hai to wo feedback aapko dalna hoga aur dusra fir usi se matlab related hamare paas mein lead aa rahi hongi matlab wo bade order ki. Aur dusra isme aapne auto refresher lagaya hua hai apne system par?
Customer: Account pe hi jaata hai saari cheeze.
Executive: Matlab? Matlab jaise ki aapka page jo hai lead wala bylead wala wo har thodi thodi der mein apne aap hi refresh hota rahe kyunki koi bhi lead aa rahi hai turant mein aap usko immediate dekh pao. Aisa kuch lagaya hai usme filter wagera aapne?
Customer: Nahi. Nahi nahi.
Executive: To main ek kaam karungi na abhi aapki service jo hai jo shuru hui hai to ek bar aapko na account manager assign kara ke aur unse puri na training dilwa dungi ki kis tarike se isko aapko use karna hai taki aap uska pura matlab benefit jo le paye. To aapko usko login mode pe hi chhod kar ke rakhna hoga aapka profile jo hai seller.indiamart.com. Use kaise karte ho mobile application?
Customer: Login mode pe hi rehta hai.
Executive: Achha login mode pe hi rehta hai. Thik hai. To usme na ek auto refresher main aapke us pe lagwa dungi taki koi bhi lead aati hai to wo aap immediate basis pe consume kar paye aur usme directly use kar rahe hai aap ya fir koi staff hai aapka consume karne ke liye?
Customer: Nahi nahi directly directly yahi kar rahe hai.
Executive: Aap hi directly use kar rahe ho. To thik hai wo lead mil jayegi but usme na thoda sa abhi aap feedback wagera jo hai ek bar wo dekhna ki pehle feedback daily basis pe thoda dijiye kyunki naya profile abhi shuru hua hai to thoda sa usme purchasing patterns aapko set karne padenge. Aur kuch shahar aur badhaiye jinme leads aap consume karte hai waha se matlab kuch shahar bhi aur badhaiye har shahar se jaha se lead kharidna chahte hai ya dekhna chahte hai waha se lead uthana shuru kariye. To main isme na sir ek kaam karungi aapka na proper ek account manager maine aapko assign kar diya hai abhi. Thik hai? Deepak naam hai Hansika Solanki karke naam hai.
Customer: Assign ho gaya tha na?
Executive: Hansika Solanki ek minute rukiyega zara.
Hmm.
Executive: Haan unke paas se na jo kyunki aapne star liya hai to abhi hamare paas mein move ho gaya hai aapka profile Hansika ke paas se. To main abhi jo hai aapko yaha pe ab premium department mein aa gaya hai to yaha se call ek bar karaungi taki pura guidance aapko service pe wo de aur uske baad mein aap usko thik usi tarike se use kar paye matlab wo pura main karwaungi aapki training wo jitne bhi customer aate hai naye unki hum log proper matlab ek service ki call lete hai video meeting par taki pura guide kar paye ki kis tarike se aapko ye wali service jo hai effectively use karni hai.
Executive: To aap mujhe kal ka samay bata do kis time pe aap available honge ya agar aaj available hai to main unko bol deti hun ek call abhi aapko right away kar lenge.
Customer: Haan kar lenge abhi koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Abhi karwa du?
Customer: Haan haan abhi karwa dijiye.
Executive: Thik hai chalo main ek bar aapko abhi call kara rahi hun aap uske according unse baat kar lena taki wo detail mein aapko sara kuch bata denge. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Haan thik hai. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving large orders despite Star package.

- No notifications for large orders.



Resolution:

- Executive explained filter settings for large orders.

- Suggested providing feedback on past leads.

- Auto refresher to be installed for immediate lead view.

- Account manager assigned for training.



Next Steps: 

- Account manager will call for training.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filters, account manager, training
